EmailTemplate.description: Notification after BX009 Status is set to 'BRB Approved' and Finance Team needs to associate PA Code to the Project. Mail should include link to the specific BX009 and also mention step wise details on what needs to be done
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009:Finance Team to associate a PA Code
EmailTemplate.subject: BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' needs PA Code
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, The BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been approved by BRB and Process ID has been associated to it by Project Lead. Please associate a PA Code to the BX009 by following the below steps:
1. Access the specific BX009 via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link} 2. Login Salesforce application using your Salesforce.com User Id and password 3. Click on Edit button present on this page and scroll down to 'PA Code' field present in 'Project Kick Off' Section and enter the PA Code for this BX009 4. Click on Save button present on the page 5. Logout of Salesforce.com application
Please note that the Project Lead has also created a request for the same in Service Now (http://servicenow.globalfoundries.com).
Thanks
